channel.title: Comments on: “Pay No Attention To That Racism Behind The Curtain!”

item.title: By: Open Minded Observer
item.dc:creator: Open Minded Observer
item.content:encoded:
Thank you for this! I’ve been working through my own thoughts on whiteness, it’s costs to White people and how to engage other White people in an effort to open their eyes to seeing racism as not just overt acts of discrimination.

“For whatever reason, humans just need to hear the same thing fifty different ways over years and years.”
Myself included because I’m continuously struck, amazed and saddened by words from decades or even a century ago can be repeated verbatim today because the more things change, the more they remain the same.

item.title: By: Frank Staropoli
item.dc:creator: Frank Staropoli
item.description: Okay, Nanette, I'm finally catching up with you! Excellent content; lively, creative style; challenging without being nasty. Looking forward to our meeting!
item.content:encoded: Okay, Nanette, I’m finally catching up with you! Excellent content; lively, creative style; challenging without being nasty. Looking forward to our meeting!

item.title: By: Murphy Robinson
item.dc:creator: Murphy Robinson
item.description: Fantastic piece, Nanette! Thanks for reminding me that this is a foundational piece of American racism that we don't talk about nearly enough. Racism and Capitalism are so intertwined...
item.content:encoded: Fantastic piece, Nanette! Thanks for reminding me that this is a foundational piece of American racism that we don’t talk about nearly enough. Racism and Capitalism are so intertwined…
